name: Gyrus
tagline: Framework for Rapid Development of HTML5 RDBMS-backed Bussiness Applications
body:
### Welcome to Gyrus Framework

### What is Gyrus Framework ?
Gyrus is a RAD Framework to develop HTML5 RDBMS-backed Business Applications

### Background

We're developing large business application since 1999. This is an implementation of our test & tried methodologies with an HTML5 Stack. Previous implementations were COM & NET.

### Opinionated

In the realm of large business applications. We know what works, what does not, and why. So, because we have a specific goal, this is a very opinionated framework.

### Stack

DB Server (3rd Tier): Almost ANY RDBMS (Objective)
     - Postgre
     - MariaDB
     - ORACLE

WEB (2nd Tier, Application) Server: 
     - NGINX
     - PHP

Front-End (1st Tier) Browser: 
     - HTML5
     - Javascript
     - Gr-Client (js)
     - AJAX

Developer Stack: 
     - WPN-XM (Windows PHP NginX, XDebug,XPhrof, MariaDB
     - NetBeans (IDE, debugger for PHP 2nd tier code)
     - Chrome Develeper Tools (IDE, debug & continue for javascript 1st tier code, CSS designer)

### Future (Alternative) Stack

WEB (2nd Tier, Application) Server: 
     - NGINX
     - node.js

### Authors and Contributors
@luciotato

### Support or Contact
Use github issues
